00035 Entree& Ch_front_input::readOn(Entree& is)
00036 {

00063 // Description
00064 // Provides afield with a name, a time interval, components, and no field ownership.
00065 // The geometry includes all nodes of the domain and all faces of the boundary.
00066 // WEC : optimization possible here
00067 void Ch_front_input::getTemplate(TrioField& afield) const
00068 {
00069 
00070   afield.clear();
00071   afield.setName(le_nom().getChar());
00072 
00073   afield._time1=mon_pb->presentTime();
00074   afield._time2=mon_pb->futureTime();
00075 
00076   afield._nb_field_components=nb_comp();
00077 
00078   int org=1;
00079   if (faces_.dimension(1)==4) org=0;
00080   org=0;
00081 // en mettant org a o1 on revient a l'ancien codage
00082 
00083 
00084   const DoubleTab& sommets=org==1?mon_pb->domaine().les_sommets():sommets_;
00085   const IntTab& faces=org==1?frontiere_dis().frontiere().faces().les_sommets():faces_;
00086 
00087   assert(sommets.nb_dim()==2);
00088   assert(faces.nb_dim()==2);
00089 
00090   afield._space_dim=sommets.dimension(1);
00091   afield._mesh_dim=afield._space_dim-1;
00092   afield._nbnodes=sommets.dimension(0);
00093   afield._nodes_per_elem=::mp_max(faces.dimension(1));
00094   afield._nb_elems=faces.dimension(0);
00095 
00096 // Includes all the nodes, even those not used in connectivity
00097 // order is  x y z  x y z  x y z
00098   affecte_double_avec_doubletab(&afield._coords,sommets);
00099 
00100   affecte_int_avec_inttab(&afield._connectivity,faces);
00101 }
00102 
00103 // In the case of a mobile mesh (ALE frame) we need to call this function after each displacement of the mesh
00104 void Ch_front_input::buildSommetsFaces() const
00105 {
00106   const DoubleTab& sommets_org=(mon_pb->domaine().les_sommets());
00107   DoubleTab& sommets=sommets_;
00108   sommets.resize(sommets_org.dimension_tot(0),sommets_org.dimension(1));
00109   sommets.set_smart_resize(1);
00110 
00111   IntTab& faces=faces_;
00112   const IntTab& faces_org=(frontiere_dis().frontiere().faces().les_sommets());
00113   faces=faces_org;
00114   int ntot=0;
00115   ArrOfInt marqueur(sommets_org.dimension(0));
00116   marqueur=-1;
00117   for (int f=0; f<faces.dimension(0); f++)
00118     {
00119       for (int s=0; s<faces.dimension(1); s++)
00120         {
00121           int som=faces(f,s);
00122           if (som >= 0 && marqueur(som)==-1)
00123             {
00124 
00125               marqueur(som)=ntot;
00126               for (int dir=0; dir<dimension; dir++)
00127                 {
00128                   sommets(ntot,dir)=sommets_org(som,dir);
00129                 }
00130               ntot++;
00131             }
00132         }
00133     }
00134   sommets.resize(ntot,dimension);
00135 
00136 
00137 // on refait les faces
00138   for (int f=0; f<faces.dimension(0); f++)
00139     for (int s=0; s<faces.dimension(1); s++)
00140       faces(f,s) = faces_org(f, s) >= 0 ? marqueur(faces_org(f,s)) : -1;
00141 
00142 }
00143 
00144 // Description
00145 // Uses the first value in afield as uniform value, regardless of geometry.
00146 void Ch_front_input::setValue(const TrioField& afield)
00147 {
00148   for (int i=1; i<les_valeurs->nb_cases(); i++)
00149     Champ_Input_Proto::setValueOnTab(afield,les_valeurs[i].valeurs());
00150   Gpoint(afield._time1,afield._time2);
00151 }
00152 
00153 int  Ch_front_input::initialiser(double temps, const Champ_Inc_base& inco)
00154 {
00155   if (!Ch_front_var_instationnaire_dep::initialiser(temps,inco))
00156     return 0;
00157 
00158   /*
00159     if (nb_comp()==1)
00160     for (int i=0;i<les_valeurs->nb_cases();i++)
00161     les_valeurs[i].valeurs()=9.9e5;
00162   */
00163 
00164   buildSommetsFaces();
00165 
00166   return 1;
00167 }
00168 
00169 // setDoubleValue: actually set a field value, provided it has size 1.
00170 void Ch_front_input::setDoubleValue(const double& val)
00171 {
00172   assert(les_valeurs[0].valeurs().size() == 1);
00173   for (int i=1; i<les_valeurs->nb_cases(); i++)
00174     les_valeurs[i].valeurs()(0,0) = val;
00175 }
